snippet: Lawyers for James E. Holmes had tried to bargain for their client to plead guilty in exchange for life in prison with no chance of parole.
abstract: Prosecutors are seeking death penalty for James E Holmes, accused of killing 12 people in packed movie theater in Aurora, Colo, in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for James E. Holmes had tried to bargain for their client to plead guilty in exchange for life in prison with no chance of parole.

headline.seo: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for James Holmes
headline.main: Death Penalty Is Sought in Shooting at Colorado Theater
headline.print_headline: Death Penalty Is Sought In Shooting At Theater
